programme.title: George Romney, Mitt’s father
programme.short_synopsis: A reflection on the comment that ended the presidential campaign of George Romney.
programme.medium_synopsis: A discussion on the difficulty of predicting the results of the 1996 election, and a recollection of the mistake that dashed the presidential hopes of Governor George Romney.
programme.long_synopsis: A discussion on the difficulty of predicting the results of the 1996 election, and a recollection of the mistake that dashed the presidential hopes of Governor George Romney.
